article.title: LinQuest to Provide Military Satellite Communications
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: LinQuest Corporation, Los Angeles, California, is being awarded a $20,124,654 firm-fixed-price contract for the military satellite communications, communications analysis, systems integration and engineering services bridge.Â Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, El Segundo, California, is the contracting activity.
